<<<<<<< HEAD
A vindication of Mr. Bryan Heyns from all the calumnies and reproaches cast upon him by the phanaticks together with a short relation of the present Presbyterian Plot, against the King and government. Heyns, Bryan.
[4], 18 p.
printed for the author, Brian Heyns, and sold by Walter Davis in Amen-Corner, London : MDCLXXXII. [1682]
Identified as Wing V482, reel 2375, of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books 1641-1700". Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.. Identified by ESTC as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) H1747A.
=======
